text:
Add samplers to provide the ability to sample against:
webMethods Integration  Server Services
webMethods Broker pub/sub messaging.

These will accept XML-based test data to form the proprietary data interfaces.
creator: conorcurlett@gmail.com

text:
Created attachment 16761
Source, updated user manual, updated build.xml, screenshots for webMethods protocol Sampler.

Changes required to build.xml to build the webMethods protocol.
Changes to user manual to include information about webMethods components and
screenshots.
Changes to messages.properties to include webMethods protocol.
New source for webMethods protocol sampler.
creator: conorcurlett@gmail.com
woolfel@yahoo.com
text: I'm looking at the code now and hope to commit the code in the next day or two

creator: woolfel@yahoo.com
woolfel@yahoo.com
text: I looked at the docs in the attachment. thanks for including docs. in the doc, it states: General notes on the webMethods samplers. The implementation uses the webMethods Java Client API and Broker Client API, which requires the client.jar, wmbrokerclient.jar (Broker v6.5), client61.jar (Broker v6.1) or client601.jar (Broker v6.01) from webMethods. Due to license restrictions, JMeter does not include the jar files in the binary distribution. Please refer to webMethods Advantage Partner Site for details. I'll have to consult the other committers about the licensing issues. We may be able to accept the contribution, if we don't have the jar files in subversion and only download the required jars to build jmeter. I don't know how that would work, but perhaps sebb can respond with the feasibility of that. peter

creator: p.mouawad@ubik-ingenierie.com
text:
Sampler cannot be included due to License issues.
This version of WebMethods is now rather old.
